text: Penicillium polonicum is a species of fungus in the genus Penicillium which produces penicillic acid, verucosidin, patulin, anacine, 3-methoxyviridicatin and glycopeptides.IniProt Penicillium polonicum can spoil cereals, peanuts, onions, dried meats, citrus fruits == Further reading == * * * * * * * == References == polonicum Category:Fungi described in 1927
title: Penicillium polonicum
